game.name: MX Bikes
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: MX Bikes is a realistic motocross simulator, based on a scratch built physics engine that accurately simulates motorcycle dynamics and setup options.
game.shortDescriptionEn: MX Bikes is a realistic motocross simulator, based on a scratch built physics engine that accurately simulates motorcycle dynamics and setup options.

reviewHighlights.text: prety fun game, but it feels like the bike is always trying to spin, flip, or wheel spill, and i have tried changing the settings. good game, but woul...
very fun like super fun i have had the best times on my steam deck in the truck or car its just fun thats all
